name: Lost (itch) (Darko Markan)
description:
Lost is a RPG Adventure game created by Darko Markan. 

You woke up alone in the woods. Try to survive and find out what happened.

- Pick up items

- Increase stats

- Battle enemies

- Play with keyboard

Disclaimer: This game is created for fun and it's not intended on making profit. All credit for art and music  goes to their creators and is publicly available online.
